segments.text: I'm observing this kitchen, and it's oddly captivating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands at the sink, towel in hand over the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet running steadily, but the basin can't hold it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the water's cascading over the front!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: No, wait, her shoe's already wet from the flood on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But she keeps polishing away, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's perched on that stool like a mountaineer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got one hand in the cookie jar, the other balancing a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tilting backâ€”oh man, that's precarious!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, arm up, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sun through the window highlights the garden's neat rows.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how unaware the adult is of the mischief and mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears if that stool gives way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet the cookies look tempting even from here.
segments.speaker: PAR
